TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IControlParameterTarget

Docs.summary: Defines members that a class must implement in order to provide data to for an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The control that implements this interface can be set as the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControlParameter.ControlId%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControlParameter> object.

Docs.summary: Gets the column to which the parameter is being applied, if available.
Docs.value: The column to which the parameter is being applied, if available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implementing this property is optional. A <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterUserControl> object can provide it, but controls such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control cannot.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPropertyNameExpression(string columnName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get an expression that can be used as a control parameter's property name.
Docs.returns: An expression that can be used as a control parameter's property name.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the data that is being served by this provider.
Docs.value: The type of the data that is being served by this provider.
